description:
Franky and Señor Pink end their harrowing duel in a manly way - but victory knocks the wind out of even the winner`s sails! Meanwhile, Diamante and Kyros struggle desperately on the Sunflower Field, each demonstrating their extreme prowess even in near defeat!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Poussière d`étoiles mortelles. Le déluge d`attaques de Diamante
Shi no Hoshikuzu: Diamante Moukou no Arashi
Stardust of Death! Diamante`s Storm of Vicious Attacks!
Tödlicher Sternenstaub – Diamantes Sturm der bösartigen Angriffe
Звёздная пыль смерти. Буря беспощадных атак Диаманте
死の星屑 ディアマンテ猛攻の嵐
